citoid-citoiddialog-search-label: URL, DOI, ISBN, PMC/PMID, QID, title, or citation
citoid-citoiddialog-use-general-error-me: We couldn't make a citation for you. You can create one manually using the "{{int:citoid-citoiddialog-mode-manual}}" tab above.
citoid-desc: Provides access points between the citoid service and MediaWiki
citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-mess: You can use the "{{int:citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-button}}" button below to generate a properly formatted reference from the external link.
citoid-unknown-error: An unknown error has occurred that prevented us from creating a citation. Please try again later.
citoid-wb-pendingdialog-error: Unable to generate a reference from this input. Use the manual tab, or try again.
citoid-wb-pendingdialog-message: Generating a reference for you... please wait...
